Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
SinglePlayerGame
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the intermediary between all the game's components.

    • Game

      public Game()
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player player)
      This method adds a player in the playersList.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who has just joined.

    • drawCard

      public LeaderCard drawCard()
      This method is used to draw a Leader Card from the deck.
      Returns:
      The drawn Leader Card.

    • pickMarketRes

      public java.util.HashMap<ResourceType,​java.lang.Integer> pickMarketRes​(char rowOrCol, int rowOrColNumber, ResourceType conversion)
      Calls the method pickResources from the class Market and returns the resources.
      Parameters:
      rowOrCol - 'c' stands for column, 'r' stands for row.
      rowOrColNumber - the number of the row/column. Starts from 0.
      conversion - the ResourceType the player can obtain with the white marble. It must be null if the player doesn't have any conversion.
      Returns:
      a HashMap representing the resources list.

    • returnDevCard

      public void returnDevCard​(DevCard card)
      This method calls the returnDevCard method from the DevMarket class.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be added.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      Returns the player associated to the username passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      Returns:
      the player with the given username.

    • pickDevCard

      public DevCard pickDevCard​(Color color, int level)
      Pick the Development Card with the features passed as parameters.
      Parameters:
      color - the chosen Development Card color.
      level - the chosen Development Card level.
      Returns:
      the chosen Development Card.

    • endGame

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> endGame()
      Ends the game and communicate the result.
      Returns:
      the results in a Hash Map.

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPlayerListByUsername()
      Used to obtain all the players' usernames.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of usernames.

    • updateFaithTrack

      public boolean updateFaithTrack()
      Update the FaithTrack and returns a boolean that represents if a FaithZone has been activated.
      Returns:
      true if a FaithZone has been activated, otherwise false.

    • lastActivatedFaithZone

      public int lastActivatedFaithZone()
      Returns the last activated FaithZone.
      Returns:
      the last activated FaithZone.

    • getFaith

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getFaith​(java.lang.String username)
      Used to get the faith space.
      Returns:
      the players' faith space.

    • increaseFaith

      public boolean increaseFaith​(int faith, boolean activateOnYourself, java.lang.String username)
      Increases the faith space of a player.
      Parameters:
      faith - points to be added.
      activateOnYourself - true if points must be added to the active player, false if must be added only to others player instead of the active one.
      username - username of the active player.
      Returns:
      true if a FaithZone has been activated, false otherwise.

    • getVictoryPoints

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getVictoryPoints()
      Returns the Victory Points for each player.
      Returns:
      all the victory points for each player.
